ModMetaData.name: Archotech++
ModMetaData.author: taranchuk
ModMetaData.description:
Archotech++ is a revamped version of the mod Archotech+ by Biscuit and Archotech+ (Continued) by Mlie.
Conceived by Biscuit, continued by Mlie, revamped by Taranchuk.
Archotech Cortex Now a combination of Joywire, half-cycler, and painstopper but with non of the drawbacks.
Archotech Regenerator -Now heals illnesses such as malaria, flu, and gut worms. -Now heals diseases such as Carcinoma, HeartAttack and Asthma. -Regenerates the appropriate limb if chopped off. (In this ravamped version, if a pawn has a archotech arm that gets chopped off, it will regenerate a archotech arm.)
Archotech Metamorphose(New implant!) A self installable implant when used, gives you all archotech body parts from the following mods. -Vanilla -Save Our Ship 2
